trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en mängd <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The StrokeCollection enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes.
trans-unit.target: StrokeCollection kan du utföra funktioner, till exempel träffar testning, Urklippet och radering av linjer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> provides, the StrokeCollection offers more options.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>kontrollen utför många av dessa funktioner, men om du behöver mer kontroll än den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>ger StrokeCollection erbjuder flera alternativ.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: I följande tabell visas hur du lär dig mer om hur du hanterar digitala pennanteckningar på en anpassad kontroll.

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values |Term|Definition| |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|A string that represents the stroke in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).|
trans-unit.target: | Om du vill... | Finns i denna artikel | |-----------------|----------------------| | Skapa en kontroll som samlar in digitala pennanteckningar | [Skapar en färg indata kontrollen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Skapa en kontroll som gör att användaren kan markera handskrift | [Så här: markera handskrift från en anpassad kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Skapa en kontroll som gör att användaren kan punkt Radera pennanteckningar | [Så här: radera på en anpassad kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) | ## XAML attributsyntax ``` ``` ## XAML objektet Elementsyntax ``` ``` ## XAML värden | Termen | Definitionen av | |----------|----------------| | `isfString`| En sträng som representerar stroke i Base64-kodade pennanteckningar serialiserat Format (ISF). |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class that contains the specified strokes.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> klass som innehåller de angivna linjerna.

trans-unit.source: The strokes to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Linjer ska läggas till i <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> of Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
trans-unit.target: Initierar en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> från den angivna <xref:System.IO.Stream>för pennanteckningar serialiserat Format (ISF).</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains ink data.
trans-unit.target: En dataström som innehåller pennanteckningar data.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified strokes to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till angivna linjer till den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Add method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Add genererar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> att lägga till i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A in strokes is already a member of the .
trans-unit.target: A in strokes is already a member of the .

trans-unit.source: strokes is .
trans-unit.target: strokesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en anpassad egenskap till den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AddPropertyData method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddPropertyData kan du lägga till anpassade egenskaper till en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sedan ta med extra information med <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to associate with the custom property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>ska associeras med den anpassade egenskapen.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för den anpassade egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types, except <xref:System.String>, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`måste vara av typen <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>eller en matris med dessa datatyper utom <xref:System.String>, vilket inte är tillåtet.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is an empty .
trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdär en tom .

trans-unit.source: -or- propertyData is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: - eller - propertyData är inte en av de tillåtna datatyper som anges i den avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: Clears all strokes from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rensar alla linjer från den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that are outside the bounds of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort alla linjer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> som är utanför det giltiga intervallet för den angivna <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> matris.

trans-unit.source: The Clip method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Clip ansluter de första och sista punkten i `lassoPoints` att skapa lasso.

trans-unit.source: The Clip method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it clips.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Clip genererar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>händelse för varje <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>den klipp.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som anger området klipps.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not extend beyond the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter alla linjer som klipps av den angivna rektangeln med nya linjer som inte överskrida den angivna rektangeln.

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely outside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Alla linjer som är helt utanför den angivna rektangeln tas bort.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som anger området klipps.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kopior av <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method copies each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in the collection and the new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> references the new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Clone kopierar varje <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>i samlingen och den nya <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>refererar till de nya linjerna.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kopia av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar om den angivna anpassade egenskapsidentifieraren är den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>att hitta i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den angivna anpassade egenskapsidentifieraren i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ritar linjerna i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> on which to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> som du vill rita den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the ink that is within the bounds of the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort pennanteckningar som ligger inom gränserna för det angivna området.

trans-unit.source: The Erase method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Radera ansluter de första och sista punkten i `lassoPoints` att skapa lasso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>kan innehålla nya linjer när Radera-metoden anropas.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Om det angivna området är via mitten av exempelvis en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, radera metoden tar bort som <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>och skapar två nya linjer.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Radera genererar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>händelse för varje <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>den raderar.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som anger området som ska tas bort.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not enter the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter alla linjer som klipps av den angivna rektangeln med nya linjer som inte anger gränserna för den angivna rektangeln.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>kan innehålla nya linjer när Radera-metoden anropas.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Om det angivna området är via mitten av exempelvis en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, radera metoden tar bort som <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>och skapar två nya linjer.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely inside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Alla linjer som är helt inom den angivna rektangeln tas bort.

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Radera genererar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>händelse för varje <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>den raderar.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som anger området som ska tas bort.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the region created by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> along the specified path with new Strokes that are not clipped by the region.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter alla linjer som klipps efter region som skapats av den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> längs sökvägen med nya linjer som inte klipps av regionen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>kan innehålla nya linjer när Radera-metoden anropas.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `path` intersects the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om `path` korsar mitten av en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, radera metoden tar bort som <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>och skapar två nya linjer.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Radera genererar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>händelse för varje <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>den raderar.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the path to be erased.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> som anger sökvägen till raderas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> som anger formen på Radera.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the strokes in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar gränserna för linjerna i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The GetBounds method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> that takes the appearance of the rendered <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetBounds returnerar en <xref:System.Windows.Rect>som tar utseendet på den renderade <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is 10 display independent pixels (DIP) wide, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> includes the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>är 10 visa oberoende bildpunkter (DIP), som <xref:System.Windows.Rect>omfattar hela bredd i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Rect> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the bounds of the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som innehåller gränserna för linjer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with a lasso (freehand) path.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"> </xref> som träffar tester av <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> med en lasso (fri hand) sökväg.

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalLassoHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetIncrementalLassoHitTester returnerar ett <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>som överväger en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>ska vara "träffar" när sökvägen lasso omger det.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to select a stroke with a lasso tool.
trans-unit.target: Detta är användbart för att implementera funktioner, till exempel möjlighet att välja en linje med en lassoverktyget.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> to implement the lasso selection tool.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>använder en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>att implementera verktyget Lassomarkering.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The minimum percentage of each <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that must be contained within the lasso for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: Minsta procentandel av varje <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som måste finnas i lasso för att den ska anses vara identiska.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"> </xref> som träffar tester av <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with an erasing path.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"> </xref> som träffar tester av <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> med en suddningsläge sökväg.

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester returnerar ett <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>som överväger en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>ska vara "påträffades" när sökvägen Radera korsar det.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to erase part of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Detta är användbart för att implementera funktioner, till exempel möjligheten att radera en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>använder en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>när <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the tip of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> som anger tips pennan.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"> </xref> som träffar tester av <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar värdet för den anpassade egenskapen som är associerade med den angivna <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> and GetPropertyData methods enable you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A>och GetPropertyData metoder kan du lägga till anpassade egenskaper till en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sedan ta med extra information med <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the custom property to get.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that intersect the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en mängd med linjer som korsar angiven.

trans-unit.source: The point to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Punkten att träffa test.

trans-unit.target: En samling <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt som korsar angiven.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that have at least the specified percentage of length within the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en mängd med linjer som har minst den angivna procentandelen av längd inom det angivna området.

trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> som representerar gränserna för området för att vara träffa testas.

trans-unit.source: The acceptable length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, as a percentage, for `lassoPoints` to contain.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that intersect with the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en mängd med linjer som överlappar den angivna sökvägen.

trans-unit.target: En av linjer som överlappar path .

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that intersect the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en mängd med linjer som korsar det angivna området.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> att träffa test.

trans-unit.target: En samling <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt som korsar angiven.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that have at least the specified percentage of length within the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en mängd med linjer som har minst den angivna procentandelen av längd inom den angivna rektangeln.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounds to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som anger intervallet att vara träffa testas.

trans-unit.source: The minimum required length of a Stroke that must exist within bounds for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: Den minsta tillåtna längden för en linje måste ligga inom intervallet för att den ska anses vara identiska.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that has strokes with at least the specified percentage within the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> som har linjer med minst den angivna procentandelen inom den <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar index för den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns -1 if `stroke` is not a member of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IndexOf returnerar -1 om `stroke` är inte en medlem i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The stroke whose position is required.
trans-unit.target: Det streck vars plats krävs.

trans-unit.source: The index of the stroke.
trans-unit.target: Indexet för streck.

trans-unit.source: Represents the native persistence format for ink data.
trans-unit.target: Representerar interna beständiga dataformat pennanteckningar.

trans-unit.source: Use the InkSerializedFormat field to specify the format of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> when you transfer data, such as when you copy the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Använd InkSerializedFormat-fältet för att ange formatet för den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>när du överför data, till exempel när du kopierar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>till Urklipp.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.target: Det angivna streck

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Att en händelse utlöstes anropar händelsehanteraren via ett ombud.

trans-unit.source: The OnStrokesChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnStrokesChanged kan också härledda klasser att hantera händelsen utan att koppla en delegat som är den prioriterade metoden för hantering av händelsen i en härledd klass.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when custom property is added or removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när egenskapen läggs till eller tas bort från den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified strokes from the collection.
trans-unit.target: De angivna linjerna tas bort från samlingen.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>komprimera den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the stroke at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter stroke med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to replace the stroke.
trans-unit.target: Den position som ska ersätta linjen.

trans-unit.source: The stroke to replace the current stroke.
trans-unit.target: Det streck att ersätta den aktuella linjen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> in the collection changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> i samlingen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Modifies each of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> and optionally the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform*> for each stroke in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> according to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar var och en av de <> </> *> och eventuellt den <> </> *> för varje stroke i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> enligt den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the Transform method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes.
trans-unit.target: När `applyToStylusTip` är `true`, Transform-metoden påverkar formen från pennan tips samt positionen för streck.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted.
trans-unit.target: Om du roterar exempelvis en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>90 grader linjerna flytta runt en axel och höjden och bredden på linjerna verkar inverteras.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> which specifies the transformation to perform on the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> som anger transformationen att utföra på den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>tillämpa omvandlingen spets från pennan; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
